main event: A civilian near Condamine, Queensland, Australia, observed two torpedo-shaped, silvery objects traveling at a high speed for approximately 25 seconds before disappearing on February 7, 1951. This observation was captured in an old UFO report from Project Blue Book.
interesting points: The objects were described as bright and similar to a V-2 rocket by someone who had seen V-2 rockets during their time with the R.A.F. in England.
The object was observed to leave a vapor trail and appeared similar to a jet traveling at high altitude and speed.

There was a sketch accompanying the report detailing an unidentified flying object with dimensions of approximately 80 feet in length and 40 feet in width, flying at an estimated height of 10,000 feet.
Another witness reported seeing a formation of approximately 8 glittering objects flying in a straight line at an estimated altitude of 20,000 feet for about 2 minutes before disappearing.
The report includes statements from both civilian and military personnel, providing a variety of perspectives on the unidentified objects.
